summary: This document is an email chain between Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York regarding a draft letter to be filed with the court on April 19, 2021. It shows coordination among prosecutors on a legal filing related to the Epstein case.

events.title: Prosecutors prepare court filing
events.description: Assistant United States Attorneys in the Southern District of New York draft and edit a letter for filing with the court regarding the Epstein case.

locations.name: One Saint Andrew's Plaza
locations.context: Office address of the Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York

locations.name: Southern District of New York
locations.context: Federal judicial district handling the Epstein case

keyFacts: Prosecutors in the Southern District of New York were actively working on the Epstein case as of April 2021.
The document shows coordination among Assistant United States Attorneys on a legal filing.
The email chain includes edits to a draft letter intended for court filing.
All personal names in the document appear to be redacted or represented by placeholders.
